price: (Ó sọ pé): “Ẹ kó àwọn ẹrúsìn Allāhu lé mi lọ́wọ́. Dájúdájú èmi ni Òjíṣẹ́ olùfọkàntán fún yín.
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
